messages.title: LABOUR HAS DELIVERED ON HEALTH, EDUCATION & EMPLOYMENT
LABOUR HAS DELIVERED IN THIS CONSTITUENCY MORTGAGES, PENSIONERS & FAMILIES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Shortest waiting times since NHS began, three million more operations each year, over 44,000 more and better paid doctors, over 89,000 more and better paid nurses.
More new schools in the last decade than last century, over 42,000 more teachers, 123,000 more teaching assistants, over 3 million Child Trust Funds have been started.

Despite recession—more people in work than in 1997, National Minimum Wage for the lowest paid workers, Minimum Wage uprated each year—benefits 1 million people, 234,000 apprenticeships now compared to 75,000 in 1997.
65.6% of households are privately owned, mortgage rates at their lowest since the 1950's, on average mortgage holders are £4,000 a year better off.

3,580 pensioners aged 80+ received £400 winter fuel payment, 21,140 individual recipient households received £250 winter fuel payment, 7,130 pensioners are paid an average of £54 per week Pension Credit.
Working & Child Tax Credit paid to 9,400 families, Record increases in Child Benefit.

issues.education: More new schools in the last decade than last century, over 42,000 more teachers, 123,000 more teaching assistants, over 3 million Child Trust Funds have been started.
issues.health: Shortest waiting times since NHS began, three million more operations each year, over 44,000 more and better paid doctors, over 89,000 more and better paid nurses.

images.caption: Image of the candidate, Jim Hood, accompanied by text related to Labour's achievements in health, education, employment, supporting mortgages, pensioners, and families.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Jackie Burns on behalf of Jim Hood, both at 16 Clove Mill Wynd, Larkhall ML9 1NT. Printed by Biz Print, Unit 4, Priestfield Industrial Estate, Blantyre, Glasgow G72 0JA. Tel: 01698 720000.
